references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic models which are the basis for many modern text-to-image diffusion models, including those this paper personalizes.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper introduces a text-to-image model that uses CLIP to guide the image generation process, which is a key component of many modern text-to-image models, including those that this paper studies.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-resolution text-to-image diffusion model, which is a key advance that allows for the generation of higher-quality images than previous models.

references.paper_title: DreamBooth: Fine tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation
references.reason: This paper introduces DreamBooth, a method for personalizing text-to-image models, which is a key technique that this paper builds upon and extends.
This paper introduces the Segment Anything Model (SAM), a foundation model for image segmentation, which is used in this paper for data augmentation and inference.
